metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13715 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Omnibox in Google Chrome prior to 78.0.3904.70 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via IDN homographs via a crafted domain name.

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
